name: Lotus Notes Traveler Server Config File
summary: Learn about .NTS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The default NTS file is named bootstrap.nts. It may be deployed on a Traveler server in the Domino Web server directory, which is located in "[Domino data directory]\domino\html\traveler\bootstrap\bootstrap.nts."

description: Configuration file used by Lotus Notes Traveler, a program that syncs Lotus Notes data with desktop and mobile devices; contains information required to connect to the Lotus Notes Traveler server; saved in an XML format and includes the user ID, host name, port numbers, servlet path, and other data.
